title: Vivo Bar and Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Asian, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Seaside restaurant in a tropical setting overlooking Palm Cove beach. Combines Australian, Mediterranean, and Asian cuisines. With a few days advance notice, kitchen will cater for vegans - let the staff know how many courses you require. Otherwise, a vegan meal without notice will be simple. Several vegetarian dishes are on the regular menu.
